tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    location TEXT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    location VARCHAR,
    reading_type VARCHAR,
    reading_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR,
    manufacturer VARCHAR,
    installation_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city VARCHAR,
    country VARCHAR,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    reading_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_installation (
    installation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID REFERENCES sensor_data(sensor_id),
    device_id UUID REFERENCES device(device_id),
    group_id UUID REFERENCES sensor_group(group_id),
    installation_date DATE
);
